member.name: T:IGT.PA.Framework.EgmClients.Interfaces.IWinComboAward
member.summary: This interface defines the objects for the win awards in a win category. Author: Stanley Calixte

member.name: P:IGT.PA.Framework.EgmClients.Interfaces.IWinComboAward.WinComboAwardIndex
member.summary: The Index of the award. Default is always zero (0).

member.name: P:IGT.PA.Framework.EgmClients.Interfaces.IWinComboAward.WinAwardNoMultiplier
member.summary: Win award that is not subject to any multiplier.

member.name: P:IGT.PA.Framework.EgmClients.Interfaces.IWinComboAward.WinAwardWithMultiplier
member.summary: Win award that is always subject to a multiplier.

member.name: P:IGT.PA.Framework.EgmClients.Interfaces.IWinComboAward.TotalWinAward
member.summary: Depending on the award and the bet TotalWinAward is the true win award. TotalWinAward = WinAwardNoMultiplier + (WinAwardWithMultiplier * WinAwardMultiplier) * Bet per line affected. TotalWinAward = WinAwardNoMultiplier + (WinAwardWithMultiplier * WinAwardMultiplier) * Bet per way affected. TotalWinAward = WinAwardNoMultiplier + (WinAwardWithMultiplier * WinAwardMultiplier) * TotalBet for scatter win.

member.name: P:IGT.PA.Framework.EgmClients.Interfaces.IWinComboAward.WinAwardMultiplier
member.summary: Multiplier for the win awards - Default is one (1).

member.name: P:IGT.PA.Framework.EgmClients.Interfaces.IWinComboAward.BetType
member.summary: {ALL, MAX, Specific} are the three options.

member.summary: The list of possible Bet Coins

member.summary: Unknown thus far.
